    • Constructor Detail

      • Point

        public Point(double[][] points,
             char mark,
             java.awt.Color color)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        points - a n-by-2 or n-by-3 matrix that are the coordinates of points.
        mark - the mark of points.
        • . : dot
        • + : +
        • - : -
        • | : |
        • * : star
        • x : x
        • o : circle
        • O : large circle
        • @ : solid circle
        • # : large solid circle
        • s : square
        • S : large square
        • q : solid square
        • Q : large solid square
        • others : dot
        color - the color of points.
